title: Strengthening Practical AI Competencies: Expanding Mathematical Thinking through Geometric Definition Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental geometry concepts (conic sections, vectors, etc.) and argumentative reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can concretize informal definitions based on geometric phenomena found in real-life problems
Learners can refine definitions through peer interaction and reinterpret them using formal mathematical terminology
Learners can explain dynamic characteristics of geometric concepts (e.g., expanding the definition of a parallelogram to a quadrilateral) following RME principles
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
